EmailTemplate.name: APTS_LP_Email Template for presenting Quotation
EmailTemplate.subject: Proposal from {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.OwnerFullName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Primary_Contact__c},
Thank you for your interest in our products and services.
We are pleased to present this proposal for your review. Please let me know if it meets your expectations.
Best Regards,
{!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.CreatedBy}
